content: S-MD KF Self-drilling metal screws Self-drilling screws (Kwik-cote coated carbon steel) without washer for medium-thick metal-to-metal fastenings (up to 0.25 in) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling screw for fast assembly in one step Utilizes an innovative differential hardness technology, virtually immune to hydrogen-assisted stress corrosion cracking (HASCC) Fast and robust drill tip Manufactured in the USA Applications Fastening sheet metal and profiles to steel substructures and framing, with or without intermediate insulation layers Kwik-cote coating for fastening in mildly corrosive environments Thin to medium-thick metal-to-metal connections (up to 0.25 in) Fastening treated lumber to steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Carbon steel Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Base materials | Carbon steel | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 408123 - Kwik-Flex screw 10-16 x 3/4 HWH3 - Package Size 6000 pc - 87572 - Kwik-Flex screw 12 -14 x 7/8 HWH3 - Package Size 5000 pc - 87648 - Kwik-Flex screw S-MD 1/4-14 x 1 HWH3 - Package Size 3000 pc - 87647 - Package Size 1500 pc - 452 - Kwik-Flex screw 1/4-20 x 2 HWH4 - Package Size 1500 pc - 8595 - Kwik-Flex screw 12-14 x 2 HWH3 - Package Size 2000 pc - 10436 - Kwik-Flex screw 1/4-20 x 2-1/2 HWH4 - Package Size 1000 pc
